title: Introduction to RF and Microwave Systems & Circuits
description:
Wireless communication and sensing systems play an ever increasing role in society. This module introduces the RF and microwave hardware systems and circuits.

The applications include: GSM/CDMA, RFID, UWB, WLAN, Bluetooth, Zigbee, Radar and remote sensing
prerequisite: PC2020 (for AY2017 intake & after) ; EE2011 (for AY2016 intake & prior)
preclusion: EE3104E, TEE3104 Introduction to RF and Microwave Systems & Circuits.
